trans-unit.source: Represents the `<Signature>` element of an XML signature.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> class represents the <`Signature`> element of an XML signature defined by the XML digital signature specification.
The <`Signature`> element is the root element of an XML digital signature.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A>, <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A>, and <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> properties encapsulate the subelements of the <`Signature`> element.
For more information about the <`Signature`> element, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref> class.
Adds a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject"></xref> to the list of objects to be signed.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> method adds a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> object to a collection that is accessible using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> property.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject"></xref> to be added to the list of objects to be signed.
Returns the XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
The XML representation of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo"></xref> property is `null`.
-or-
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue"></xref> property is `null`.
Gets or sets the ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.Id%2A> property to add a string ID to the XML representation of the current <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> element.
The ID is used to reference the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature> from another location.
The ID of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
The default is `null`.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.KeyInfo%2A> property uses a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo> object to represent the <`KeyInfo`> element of an XML digital signature.
For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.KeyInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
Loads a <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref> state from an XML element.
The XML element from which to load the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref> state.
The value parameter is `null`.
The value parameter does not contain a valid .
-or-
The value parameter does not contain a valid .
Gets or sets a list of objects to be signed.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.ObjectList%2A> property uses a collection of <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> objects to represent the <`Object`> tag of an XML digital signature.
You can also add a <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.DataObject> to this collection using the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.AddObject%2A> method.
For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
A list of objects to be signed.
Gets or sets the value of the digital signature.
The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignatureValue%2A> property uses a byte array to represent the <`SignatureValue`> element of an XML digital signature contained within.
For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
A byte array that contains the value of the digital signature.
Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature.SignedInfo%2A> property uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo> class to represent the <`SignedInfo`> element of an XML digital signature contained within.
For more information about XML digital signatures, see the W3C specification at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
The <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedInfo"></xref> of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.Signature"></xref>.
